adDetails: Call for all your drywall needs. I have over 20 years of drywall experience, became a license drywall contractor in 2001. I take great pride in being clean,courteous, and providing the highest quality possible at a reasonable price. Been helping people with their drywall needs such as: -MAKING OLD WALLS LOOK NEW- -HAND TEXTURES- -Smooth wall -Old world -Skip trowel -SPRAY TEXTURES- -Spray knockdown -Orange peel -Imperfect smooth -REPAIRS- -Cracks -Holes -Water damage -Rental repairs -Acoustic removal and texture Please CALL me at show contact info ask for JIM show contact info- ASK FOR MIKE. THANKS
